result.eng: I'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
result.ga: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraige
result.orig: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraige
result.html: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraigeI'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
result.ponchtml: Inseoiḋ mise do m'aṫair air é aċ é a ṫeaċt ón ḟarraigeI'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
